original_text: ‘Speak to the Israelites. They must send any person with a disease of the skin away from the camp. Or somebody may have a disease that causes pus to come out of his body. Any person like that is not clean. Anyone who has touched a dead person is also not clean. Send those people out of the camp too.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 명령하여 모든 나병 환자와 유출증이 있는 자와 주검으로 부정하게 된 자를 다 진영 밖으로 내보내되

sentences.original_text: They must send any person with a disease of the skin away from the camp.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 피부병이 있는 사람을 진영 밖으로 내보내야 한다.

sentences.original_text: Or somebody may have a disease
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 어떤 사람은 질병을 가질 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: that causes pus to come out of his body.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 몸에서 고름이 나오게 하는 질병이다.

sentences.original_text: Any person like that is not clean.
Anyone who has touched a dead person
Send those people out of the camp too.
